Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Aparthotel Rubimar Suite in Yaiza (Playa Blanca), you'll be minutes from Marina Rubicon and close to Playa Dorada. This 4-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Plaza Nuestra Senora del Carmen and Papagayo Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 96 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. 32-inch flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and an outdoor tennis court. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Aparthotel Rubimar Suite. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the aparthotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Aparthotel Rubimar Suite. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the aparthotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Aparthotel Rubimar Suite in Yaiza (Playa Blanca), you'll be minutes from Marina Rubicon and close to Playa Dorada. This 4-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Plaza Nuestra Senora del Carmen and Papagayo Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Marina Rubicon - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Playa Dorada - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Plaza Nuestra Senora del Carmen - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Papagayo Beach - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Quemada Beach - 9.4 km / 5.8 mi
Los Hervideros Caves - 10.7 km / 6.6 mi
Whale and Dolphin Museum - 12.5 km / 7.8 mi
Playa Las Agujas - 15.3 km / 9.5 mi
Puerto del Carmen Beach - 16.1 km / 10 mi
Corralejo Dunes Natural Park - 16.8 km / 10.4 mi
Timanfaya National Park - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi
Corralejo Beach - 17.6 km / 11 mi
Lanzarote Golf Resort - 17.8 km / 11.1 mi
Rancho Texas Park - 18.1 km / 11.2 mi
Pocillos Beach - 19 km / 11.8 mi

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Rubimar Suite is Puerto del Rosario (FUE-Fuerteventura) - 45.8 km / 28.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
